principal.introduction: I'm a web developer with troubleshooting skills, self-taught with experience in React js projects

about.title: Who am I?
about.who1: I am an information systems engineer, self-taught and a student of the incredible world of web programming.
about.who2: I am an enterprising person, who loves challenges and does not give up easily. Very detailed and self-taught every day.
about.who3: Below I show the different studies chronologically so you can visualize my academic journey
